name: The Parking Space Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 3 | 10 Questions

questions.text: Where do George and Elaine take Jerry's car to in the beginning of this episode?
questions.explanation:
A flea market.

	Kramer is afraid that Jerry had his car stolen again, but Jerry gives away the secret that they used his car.

questions.text: What does George buy at the place he and Elaine went to?
questions.explanation:
A hat.

	He buys the hat for only ten dollars and he states that all bald people look good in hats.  Elaine buys sunglasses at the flea market.

questions.text: Who thinks that Jerry is a phony?
questions.explanation:
Mike.

	Kramer invites Mike Moffitt over to watch the fight, but Mike thinks Jerry is a phony.  Kramer tells him this before people start coming over to his apartment.

questions.text: Who fights George for a parking space?
questions.explanation:
Mike.

	Just as George is pulling into his space, Mike Moffitt is pulling into it.  Elaine decides just to go up to Jerry's apartment.

It makes a clanking noise.

	George hits a pothole on the way to the apartment and the car makes a clanking noise, so Elaine makes up a long story that makes Jerry forget about the pothole.

questions.text: Why is Kramer mad at George and Elaine?
questions.correct: He wasn't invited to go with them
options: They didn't bring him something back
questions.explanation:
He wasn't invited to go with them.

	Since they didn't take him to the flea market, he decides to side with Mike on the whole parking space situation.

questions.text: What is in Phil's delivery truck?
questions.explanation:
Ice cream.

	Phil the truck driver is played by a friend of Jerry's from college, Michael Costanza.  He and George share the same last name.

questions.text: What's the name of the little boy Jerry talks to in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Matthew.

	Jerry makes the mistake of saying that Matthew's father is losing his job, and he starts to regret talking to the kid.  Kramer also says something bad to Matthew's mother.

Sid.

	Sid from the episode "The Alternate Side" briefly reappears in this episode.  In "The Alternate Side", George covers Sid's job while he's on vacation.  Banya doesn't appear on the show for a while, Babu won't appear again until season four, and Nina was Jerry's girlfriend in the episode "The Letter".

questions.text: George gets the parking space in the end.
questions.explanation:
No.

	The situation remains unresolved in the end of this episode.  Even the police officers can't figure out who deserves the space.
